name: Crochet Llama Stuff Animal
description:
This is a must have for your little one.  The entire Llama was crochet by hand including the hat which is removable.  It can sit by itself  for decoration or your little can carry it around as a buddy!  

measures approx:
                                                           

 Height: 12.5 inches  sitting
                 17 inches     standing

name: Crochet Bunny Purse
description:
This bunny purse was handmade crochet and is sooooooooooooo cute! It can be used as an easter basket or a purse. Ribbon is yellow but can be any color you request to match your little one dress or favorite color. If you would like a different color bunny, just convo me. It measures 11 inches long and 14 inches tall including handles.
There is also a compartment with a sparkling button closure for her to store her items.

Thank you for looking!

name: Crochet Teddy Bear Backpack
description:
This teddy bear is so cute. 

This bear has a pink dress with white polka dots and a white polka dot ribbon tied in a bow. The bloomers are lime green. It has straps ( approximately 30 inches long) to carry the bear as a backpack. There's even a small secret compartment to hold your little ones items. The compartment is 3 inches deep and 7 inches wide. It measures about 18 inches tall. 

Made in a smoke free home.


This is a must have bear for your child!




Thanks for looking!

name: Crochet Cat Purse
description:
This cat purse was handmade crochet and is sooooooooooooo cute! Ribbon is pink and black polka dot, but can be any color you request to match your little one dress or favorite color. It measures 11 inches long and 14 inches tall including handles.
There is also a compartment with a sparkling button closure for her to store her items.

name: Crochet Doggie Purse
description: This purse was handmade with love. It measures 11 inches long and 6 inches tall (not including the handles). It has a compartment with a button closure, so that your little one can fit her small items. The colors are brown and black with a red and white ribbon.
